title: Navi Pillay visits Sri Lanka – what’s next on agenda
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Navi Pillay must thank her lucky stars that those who garlanded her did not do what they did to Rajiv Gandhi inspite of both he and mother helping LTTE rise to power. That was because LTTE was annihilated by Sri Lanka’s armed forces and the woman who garlanded her…
